alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 17 at 2:38PM EST until November 18 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches through Thursday evening. Storm total snow accumulations of 7 to 15 inches are expected. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4338 7531 4350 7536 4345 7548 4348 7581 4342 7586 4324 7586 4330 7573 4329 7564 4329 7522 4333 7519 TIME Y22M11D18T0000Z-Y22M11D18T0600Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
